1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Bane
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Bless
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Command
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Create or Destroy Water
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: You either create or destroy water. You can create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Detect Evil and Good
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Detect Magic
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Guiding Bolt
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Healing Word
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Inflict Wounds
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Purify Food and Drink
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Sanctuary
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw.

1stLevelClericSpells.Name: Shield of Faith
1stLevelClericSpells.Description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.
